Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your Community Solar Portal is now live!
On your Community Solar Portal you can:
Track your solar savings View your statements
Since you're already signed up for Autopay, your payments will automatically be collected on the first of each month - no action required!
To register your Community Solar Portal account, click on the link below. Enter the assigned username below and create a password to finish registering. Once complete, you will have access to your Community Solar Portal!
{!Opportunity.Name}'s Member Portal Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}
Have questions? Visit our FAQ page. If you have additional questions, please contact our Customer Care team at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786-4100. We're happy to help.
We look forward to a bright future ahead - All of us here at Amp and BlueWave
